docs.lead_paragraph: RESEARCHERS are adding high blood pressure to alcoholism, heart disease and other conditions that may affect women and men differently. They say there is evidence to suggest that high blood pressure is less dangerous for women than for men. Furthermore, treatments that work for men may be ineffective or even harmful for women if not used judiciously.

headline.main: High Blood Pressure May Pose Less of a Danger for Women

docs.snippet: RESEARCHERS are adding high blood pressure to alcoholism, heart disease and other conditions that may affect women and men differently.    They say there is evidence to suggest that high blood pressure is less dangerous for women than for men....
